positive_examples: This is an example of religious doctrine.
The religious doctrine demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed religious doctrine in this context.
A typical case of religious doctrine would involve these features.
The concept of religious doctrine applies here.
Core beliefs and teachings that form the foundation of a religious faith or denomination.
negative_examples: This is an example of multinational doctrine, not religious doctrine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultinationalDoctrine, or other types of Doctrine

definition: A body of beliefs and principles forming the basis of religious faith.
